name: Karlinus Pug
description: Karlinus Pug is a stealth game in sandbox format with 3D cartoon models and perspective of 3rd person, in which the protagonist, a dog named Karlinus Pug, seeks to be recognized again by his fellow citizens after being exiled from the city. Karlinus must infiltrate the kingdom Mishu, kingdom of cats, to steal a relic that protects this kingdom from the desert that surrounds it.
